Access control and personalization
Â¶
Atlan provides a
number of ways to manage access control
, at both coarse-grained and granular levels.
The primary vehicles for granular access control are
personas
,
purposes
, and the access policies defined within these.
Both personas and purposes can also be used to personalize the experience, by controlling:
which assets are visible to a particular audience
which details of each of those assets are visible
